snippet: Vitali Klitschko vacated his World Boxing Council heavyweight title Monday and retired from boxing to concentrate on Ukrainian politics and his role as an opposition leader.
abstract: Vitali Klitschko vacates his World Boxing Council heavyweight title and retires from boxing to concentrate on Ukrainian politics and his role as an opposition leader.
lead_paragraph: Vitali Klitschko vacated his World Boxing Council heavyweight title Monday and retired from boxing to concentrate on Ukrainian politics and his role as an opposition leader.
